title: Reconcile a Cash Drawer
description: At the end of a shift, a front desk agent needs to reconcile their cash drawer.

tasks.description: Run a report from the PMS showing all cash transactions processed during the shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report shows total cash receipts of $500.

tasks.description: Physically count the cash in the drawer.
Compare the physical count to the system report and document any variance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent documents a $5 'overage' on the reconciliation form.
